name: Crunch Element: VR Infiltration
description:
Blast through destructible compounds and slay cyborgs in virtual reality! Take cover as the chunks of wall, lead, and lasers whiz past your head as you prepare to return fire with a weapon that is unique to your play style!Click! BOOM
Breaching is a cornerstone mechanic to Crunch Element. Place wall charges, throw grenades, and use peculiar weapons to blow holes in walls, ceilings, and floors to crack open entry points to compounds! Plan your entrance carefully! You never know what waits on the other side...Load up!Suit up with weaponry that fits your play style! Are you an assassin who prefers to scale buildings and use silent weapons, or a beefy tank who's best friends are a shotgun and a wall charge? No matter your play style, the armory has the best pieces of firepower, cutlery, and forced entry that credits can buy!Features
  • Blast holes through walls with your breaching charges
  • Smash pesky buzz-saw drones on tables with your hands
  • Shoot rag-doll enemies in the foot before timing your killing blow
  • Scale buildings and structures multiple stories high (Look down if you dare!)
  • Slap physics-triggered buttons to open doors
Roadmap1. Private player testing and development

2. Early access single player launch

3. Full launch with multiplayer : Jump into a hectic 3v3 attack/defend style multiplayer match with other players in destructible compounds.
